code: import'../styles/createstorage.css';import{useState}from"react";import{dbService}from"../firebase";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateStorage=_ref=>{let{onNext}=_ref;const[storageName,setStorageName]=useState("");const handleChange=e=>{setStorageName(e.target.value);};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await dbService.collection("jjalbang-storageName").add({storageName:storageName,crateAt:Date.now()});setStorageName("");onNext(storageName);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"create-storage-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"create-storage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"create-storage-text",children:"\uC800\uC7A5\uC18C\uC758 \uC774\uB984\uC744 \uC785\uB825\uD574 \uC8FC\uC138\uC694."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"create-storage-input",type:"text",value:storageName,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"next-btns",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"pre-btn",children:"\uC774\uC804"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"next-btn",onClick:handleSubmit,children:"\uB2E4\uC74C"})]})]})});};export default CreateStorage;
